name: Charlie the Boy Wonder
description:
Join Charlie's one of a kind magical adventure in the Carnival! Help Charlie save the day at the Carnival and save trapped fantasy creatures, while fighting bad monsters and freaks The game combines cooperative gameplay with puzzling enemies in a top down fantasy Carnival, all in lovely crafted pixel art!

The game feature an all-new mechanic which is casting an illusion of Charlie, that can go through walls and possess magical boxes, these mechanics creates a cooperative gameplay between Charlie and his Illusion, as Charlie will gain new Spells in chapter II of the game that will make him able to shape shift the magical boxes into bombs or other helpful objects, so stay tune :)
